name: Pixel Battle：Dragon Summoner
description:
Build your own super team of heroes and save the world now!
Overcome various difficult stages to become the super hero of this adventure!
- New social interaction system to make more friends
- Various dungeon gameplays with loads of resources
- Build the strongest team to rule the world
- Idle feature with gains even when you are offline
- Hundreds of cool skins, bring you more fun
- Challenge powerful enemies to increase your ability
The choices and consequences are yours to make. Will you choose to SAVE THE WORLD or fall into obscurity!
